title: Mods are garbage
body:
Big reach when they try and say it violates the no "sex rules". No wonder no one likes you guys. Delete posts for insulting your heroes at riot.


Since all you people are saying it was INSULTING, at the TOP of the post he said: "We've recently removed your post for violating the Boards Universal Rules, particularly regarding inappropriate discussions."

NOT INSULTING.


they gave me another one. damn clowns they are:
http://prntscr.com/qhm4ol

LOL Is there a head of this forum that can fire these clowns and put in new mods? Maybe the top members. Or anyone else basically. Riot should be embarrassed they gave power to these people.
